author: wrowe
msg: Remove redundant and wrongly structured code, *driver would not
have been initialized before setting a corrupt value into the
drivers hash.
Even if re->init is not called for, this code would be better structured
+        if (rv == APR_SUCCESS && (*driver)->init) {
but I believe we must init in the context of apr (not simply the driver's
initialization logic).
Backports: 719448

author: wrowe
msg: dbd odbc driver - don't segfault when params is NULL.
Empty params are now OK.  connect will fail with a more useful message.
Changed transaction processing to be like the other dbd drivers.
After an error in a transaction, all queries/selects will fail until
end_transaction unless mode is set to APR_DBD_TRANSACTION_IGNORE_ERRORS
Submitted by: tdonovan
Backports: 707611
